key_events.description: Next dividend per share is R$0.92, ex-date February 19, 2026, payment date February 25, 2026. Annual dividend is R$11.04 per share, yield of 10.04%. Maintained dividend of R$0.92 per share for 21 months.
XP Malls considering a new issuance of shares to raise R$400 million.
BTG Pactual indicated that XPML11 expanded its portfolio through share swaps.
Net asset value reduced to R$ 112.55 per share due to a property revaluation.

investment_thesis.bull_case: XPML11 has a high annual dividend yield of 10.04% and has maintained a dividend of R$0.92 per share for 21 consecutive months. The fund's portfolio consists of investments in multiple shopping centers and is expanding its portfolio through share swaps.
investment_thesis.bear_case: The net asset value was reduced to R$ 112.55 per share due to a property revaluation. Vacancy (ABL) averaged 4.2% in October 2025.

summary_markdown: XPML11's next dividend is R$0.92 per share (ex-date February 19, 2026). The annual dividend is R$11.04 per share, yielding 10.04%. XP Malls is considering a new issuance of shares to raise R$400 million. BTG Pactual indicated that XPML11 expanded its portfolio through share swaps. The net asset value was reduced to R$ 112.55 per share due to a property revaluation. Vacancy (ABL) averaged 4.2% in October 2025.
